Package org.apache.fop.afp.modca.triplets

Contains a collection of AFP Mixed Object Document Content Architecture (MO:DCA) triplet classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Triplet Triplet interface.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTriplet A simple implementation of a MOD:CA triplet
AttributeQualifierTriplet The attribute qualifier triplet is used to specify a qualifier for a document attribute.
AttributeValueTriplet The attribute value triplet is used to specify a value for a document attribute.
CommentTriplet An inline comment triplet.
DescriptorPositionTriplet Associates an ObjectAreaPosition with and ObjectAreaDescriptor structured field
ExtendedResourceLocalIdentifierTriplet The Extended Resource Local Identifier triplet specifies a resource type and a four byte local identifier or LID.
FullyQualifiedNameTriplet A Fully Qualified Name triplet enable the identification and referencing of objects using Gloabl Identifiers (GIDs).
MappingOptionTriplet Specifies the mapping of data object presentation space to object area
MeasurementUnitsTriplet The Measurement Units triplet is used to specify the units of measure for a presentation space
ObjectAreaSizeTriplet The Object Area Size triplet is used to specify the extent of an object area in the X and Y directions
ObjectByteExtentTriplet The Object Byte Extent triplet is used to specify the number of bytes contained in an object
ObjectClassificationTriplet The Object Classification is used to classify and identify object data.
PresentationSpaceMixingRulesTriplet This triplet is used to specify the resulting appearance when data in a new presentation space is merged with data in an existing presentation space.
PresentationSpaceResetMixingTriplet This triplet is used to specify the resulting appearance when data in a new presentation space is merged with data in an existing presentation space.
ResourceObjectTypeTriplet A Resource Object Type Triplet
 

Package org.apache.fop.afp.modca.triplets Description

Contains a collection of AFP Mixed Object Document Content Architecture (MO:DCA) triplet classes.
